snippet: A bomb exploded outside a camp for Egyptian security forces in a city along the Suez Canal, killing at least one and wounding more than a dozen others.
abstract: Bomb explodes outside camp for Egyptian security forces in city along the Suez Canal, killing at least one person and wounding more than a dozen others.
lead_paragraph: A bomb exploded outside a camp for Egyptian security forces in a city along the Suez Canal, killing at least one and wounding more than a dozen others.
